H0.text: Grizzled Giant, Southern Flying and Provost’s are all types of which creature. Monkey

H1.text: Grizzled Giant, Southern Flying and Provost’s are all types of which creature. Eagle

H2.text: Grizzled Giant, Southern Flying and Provost’s are all types of which creature. Bear

H3.text: Grizzled Giant, Southern Flying and Provost’s are all types of which creature. Squirl

A4.text: Squirrels are generally small animals, ranging in size from the African pygmy squirrel and least pygmy squirrel at 10–14 cm (3.9–5.5 in) in total length and just 12–26 g (0.42–0.92 oz) in weight, to the Bhutan giant flying squirrel at up to 1.27 m (4 ft 2 in) in total length, and several marmot species, which can weigh 8 kg (18 lb) or more.
